nodes.text: The SGS-41B Comet Breaker was a starfighter produced by Sienar Fleet Systems for the Galactic Republic. Named after accidentally firing its weapon and destroying a comet during a test run, the gunship was known as a flying armory. At the cost of its moddable rail gun and a bit of its defensive capabilities, the gunship was able to equip proton torpedoes and heavy laser cannons.
